titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 100 Alabama Street NW, in Atlanta, Georgia, as the "Sam Nunn Federal Center".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/24/1996--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located at 100 Alabama Street, N.W., in Atlanta, Georgia, as the Sam Nunn Federal Center.
